Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2016 12:45PM Vidrine1 wrote: I have 8 lumps being removed from my right breast on Wednesday, the 6th, with a possible MX depending on what the rest of my breast looks like once he gets in there. Also removing lymph nodes from under my right arm. Trying NOT to be nervous... But I'm terrified. 25 years old, 2 kids, and a family history of BC.
Posts.Title: January 2016 Surgeries SVGsurvive Jr114
